languages.text:
"Вису мою вы услышьте, славные братья,
Вису о том, как сплелись меж собою пути
Ульфара, что прозван от первого дня Громогласным,
И Волка Последнего стаи Зловещего воя.
Встав над телами остывшими братьев своих,
Славные саги их небу изрек Ульфар твердорукий,
Почесть последнюю воинам гордым отдал,
В свидетели взявши соратни{mf|ка|цу} из рода Валантсий.
Вьюга ярилась и яростно выли ветра,
Снег заскрипел под ужасной когтистою лапой,
И в свете мертвом чужой человеку луны
В круг заступил зверь косматый и пахнущий смертью".

"My verses you will hear,
Glorious brothers,
Of how the paths of Ulfar,
called Thunderlung from the first,
and the Last Wolf of the Baleful Howl,
were intertwined.
Over his brothers' cold bodies standing,
Ulfar the hard-armed proclaimed
to the sky their glorious sagas,
and his last homage paid
to those warriors proud,
as his witness taking
his companion of the line von Valancius.
The blizzard was raging
and the wind furiously howling,
As under that terrible clawed paw,
the snow crunched,
and in the dead light of a moon
strange to human eyes,
a beast,
long fur bristling,
of death reeking,
into the circle stepped."

"Вису мою вы услышьте, славные братья,
Вису о том, как сплелись меж собою пути

"You shall hear my visage, glorious brothers,
The visage of how the paths of
Ulfar, who from the first day was called the Thundering One,
And of the Last Wolf of the pack hungry for glory.
Standing over the bodies of his brothers, who were cold,
Their glorious sagas were spoken to the sky by Ulfar the hard-armed,
He paid the last honor to the proud warriors,
Having taken as witnesses his companions{mf|ka|tsu} of the family of Valantsius.
The blizzard raged and the wind howled furiously,
The snow crunched under the terrible clawed paw,
And in the dead light of the moon, a stranger to man,
A beast, shaggy and smelling of death, stepped into the circle."

"My verses you will hear,
Glorious brothers,
Of how the paths of Ulfar,
called Thunderlung from the first,
and the Last Wolf of the Baleful Howl,
were intertwined.
Over his brothers' cold bodies standing,

his companion of the line von Valancius.

the snow crunched,

strange to human eyes,
a beast,
long fur bristling,
of death reeking,
into the circle stepped."

languages.text:
「栄光ある兄弟たちよ
俺の詩を聞け
サンダーラングと呼ばれ
破滅の咆哮の一匹狼である
ウルファーが歩んだ道が
絡み合う様を聞け。
兄弟たちの冷たい死体の上で
剛腕のウルファーは宣言した
彼らの栄光のサーガを天空に宣言し
彼の最後の敬意は
フォン・ヴァランシウスの仲間を証人とする
誇り高き戦士たちに
捧げられた。
猛吹雪が吹き荒れ
猛烈な風が咆哮し
その恐ろしい爪の下で
雪が砕け散った
人間の目には奇妙に映る
月の死の光の元で
獣が
死の臭いのする
長い毛皮を振り乱し
輪の中に足を踏み入れた」
languages.original_text:
"My verses you will hear,
Glorious brothers,
Of how the paths of Ulfar,
called Thunderlung from the first,
and the Last Wolf of the Baleful Howl,
were intertwined.
Over his brothers' cold bodies standing,
Ulfar the hard-armed proclaimed
to the sky their glorious sagas,
and his last homage paid
to those warriors proud,
as his witness taking
his companion of the line von Valancius.
The blizzard was raging
and the wind furiously howling,
As under that terrible clawed paw,
the snow crunched,
and in the dead light of a moon
strange to human eyes,
a beast,
long fur bristling,
of death reeking,
into the circle stepped."

languages.text:
“你们将聆听我的诗篇，
光荣的兄弟们，
最初被称作‘雷狼’，
同时也是怒嚎者的，
最后一只独狼，
乌尔法的壮丽传说。
站在兄弟们冰冷的尸体之上，
他的同伴，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的血脉，
将作为他们的见证。
见证全副武装的乌尔法向苍穹，
高声传唱他们的光荣的史诗，
向骄傲的勇士们，
致以最后的敬意。
在肆虐的暴雪里，
在呼啸的狂风中，
可怖的爪子，
将积雪踩踏得吱嘎作响。
惨白的月色，
诡异慑人，
长毛竖立的野兽，
散发着将死的气息，
踏入了陷阱。”

光荣的兄弟们，

乌尔法的壮丽传说。
站在兄弟们冰冷的尸体之上，
他的同伴，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的血脉，

languages.text:
« Mes vers vous allez entendre,
ô vous, mes nobles frères,
contant le destin singulier d'Ulfar,
connu sous le nom de Voix-du-Tonnerre
et dernier loup des Hurleurs sanguinaires.
Face aux corps inertes de ses frères,
Ulfar l'impitoyable déclama aux cieux
leur glorieuse et immortelle saga.
Puis à ces fiers guerriers défunts
un dernier hommage il rendit,
avec à ses côtés pour témoin
l'{mf|héritier|héritière} des von Valancius.
Mais dans le blizzard enragé
et les hurlements du vent,
la neige fut troublée
par une terrible patte griffue.
Et sous la lumière d'une lune
inconnue des humains,
une bête au pelage hérissé
et empestant la mort
s'avança dans le cercle. »
languages.original_text:
"My verses you will hear,
Glorious brothers,
Of how the paths of Ulfar,
called Thunderlung from the first,
and the Last Wolf of the Baleful Howl,

Face aux corps inertes de ses frères,
Ulfar l'impitoyable déclama aux cieux
leur glorieuse et immortelle saga.
Puis à ces fiers guerriers défunts
un dernier hommage il rendit,

languages.text:
«Escuchad mis versos,
gloriosos hermanos,
sobre las sendas de Ulfar,
llamado Pulmón Atronador,
y del Último Lobo del Aullido Torvo,
inevitablemente entrelazadas.
Sobre los cuerpos helados de sus hermanos,
proclama Ulfar del fuerte brazo
a los cielos sus gloriosas sagas
y su último tributo
a los guerreros henchidos de orgullo;
a su lado, como testigo,
su camarada von Valancius.
Bajo el azote de la nevada
y el aullido despiadado del viento,
como bajo una garra terrible,
la nieve crujía,
y a la luz moribunda de la luna,
desconocida para todo hombre,
una bestia,
con su grueso pelaje erizado,
en la peste de la muerte envuelta,
ante sus ojos se abrió paso».
languages.original_text:
"My verses you will hear,

a los cielos sus gloriosas sagas
y su último tributo

languages.text:
"Meine Verse werdet Ihr hören,
glorreiche Brüder,
wie die Pfade Ulfars,
vom Ersten Donnerlunge genannt,
und des Letzten Wolfs der Baleful Howl
miteinander verwoben waren.
Über den kalten Körpern seiner Brüder stehend
verkündete Ulfar der Hartarmige
dem Himmel ihre glorreichen Sagen,
und erwies diesen stolzen Kriegern
seine letzte Hommage,
bezeugt von seinem Gefährten
aus der Reihe der von Valancius.
Der Schneesturm tobte
und der Wind heulte wild,
als unter dieser schrecklichen Klauenpranke
der Schnee knirschte
und im toten Licht eines Monds,
fremd für menschliche Augen,
ein Ungeheuer
in den Kreis trat,
das lange Fell aufgestellt
und nach Tod stinkend."
languages.original_text:
"My verses you will hear,
Glorious brothers,
Of how the paths of Ulfar,

languages.text:
"Mısralarımı duyacaksınız
Şanlı kardeşlerim.
Tufanciğer olarak bilinen,
Ulfar ile
Uğursuz Uluma'nın Son Kurdu'nun,
Yolunun nasıl kesiştiğini anlatacağım.
Kardeşlerinin soğuk bedenlerinin başında
Dikilen, zırhı sağlam Ulfar;
Şanlı destanları göklere okuyup
Gururlu savaşçılara
Son kez hürmetini sundu.
Von Valancius soyundan
Yoldaşı, ona şahitlik etti.
Kar fırtınası çıkmış,
Rüzgâr öfkeyle gürlerken
Korkunç pençelerin altındaki
Karlar eziliyordu.
Ay'ın cansız ışığı altında,
İnsan gözlerine yabancı
Bir canavar;
Uzun kürkü diken diken olmuş,
Ölüm kokar vaziyette
Çembere adım attı."
languages.original_text:
"My verses you will hear,
Glorious brothers,
Of how the paths of Ulfar,
called Thunderlung from the first,
and the Last Wolf of the Baleful Howl,
were intertwined.
Over his brothers' cold bodies standing,
Ulfar the hard-armed proclaimed
to the sky their glorious sagas,
and his last homage paid
to those warriors proud,
as his witness taking
his companion of the line von Valancius.
The blizzard was raging
and the wind furiously howling,
As under that terrible clawed paw,
the snow crunched,
and in the dead light of a moon
strange to human eyes,
a beast,
long fur bristling,
of death reeking,
into the circle stepped."

traits.locale_text:
"Mısralarımı duyacaksınız
şanlı kardeşlerim,
Tufanciğer olarak bilinen,
Ulfar ile
Uğursuz Uluma'nın son Yalnız Kurt'unun,
yollarının nasıl birleştiğini anlatacak.
Kardeşlerinin soğuk bedenlerinin başında dikilen
sağlam zırhlı Ulfar,
göklere okudu şanlı destanları
ve son kez hürmetini sundu
gururlu savaşçılara.
Şahidiydi yoldaşı,
von Valancius soyundan.
Kar fırtınası eserken
ve rüzgâr öfkeyle gürlerken,
o korkunç pençelerin altında kalan
karlar eziliyordu.
Ay'ın cansız ışığı altında,
insan gözlerinin alışkın olmadığı
bir canavar,
uzun kürkü diken diken olmuş,
ölüm kokan canavar,
çemberin içine adım attı."
